channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

New Hampshire town elections offer a preview of citizenship voting rules being considered nationwide
item.description: New Hampshire has tested out its new law requiring people to show proof of citizenship before registering to vote.

item.title: Boxing heavyweight champ George Foreman dies at 76

item.title: New Mexico police investigating mass shooting in Las Cruces park
item.description: Police in New Mexico are investigating a mass shooting that occurred Friday night in Las Cruces, police said.

item.description: George Foreman, an Olympic gold medalist and two-time heavyweight champion, competed between 1967 and 1997.

item.title: Family members missing after leaving Grand Canyon, driving through storm
item.description: The family members were driving from the Grand Canyon area to Las Vegas in a rented white 2024 BMW, officials said.
